title: Recognize API calls of an APK
content:
I have an Apk file for an app that functions as an AI image generator. I want to identify the specific API call responsible for the AI image generation.
How can I do it?

answers_data.content:
Traffic interception of app. For web APIs it uses.

First you probably need to SSL unpin it using LSPosed or Frida.

Then, use traffic interception utilities like Reqable/Http Canary/Burp Suite/Mitm Proxy.
